WithCorrectionDesc: The correct answers will be displayed before moving on to the next question.
WithRetryDesc: Adds retries before saving your scores definitely. (max: 3)
withNavigateDesc: Allows you to browse questions already answered and review your answers.
WithRandomDesc: The questions will be displayed randomly.
WithProgressDesc: Allows to know the progress status and the number of questions.
WithProgressStateDesc: Adds the results (good or bad answer) to the progress bar.
WithResultsDesc: The summary of the results will be available at the end.
TrainingDesc: Training : Test your questions. Answers and results will not be saved.
RatingDesc: Rating : Evaluate your knowledge and improve your score.
ShareQuestionsDesc: You can ask your own questions to anyone, send them a uniq link now. The selected configuration will be applied
SharePageDesc: Your friend has invited you to answer at {{questionCount}} questions. Click the button below to get started.
